overview_of_class: Genetics and Molecular Biology. Principles of inheritance; methods used to study gene function; mechanisms by which DNA is replicated, transcribed into RNAs, and translated into proteins; basics of the process of natural selection.
name: Genetics and Molecular Biology
class_attributes:
Natural Sciences Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory
subject: BIOL_SCI
